page.title: 20COTSWOLD FARMS
page.content: A TYPICAL DAY.GET UP AT 5.30.MILKING AND FEEDING,BREAKFAST.ACCORDING TO SEASON FEEDING,FENCING AND HEDGING IN WINTER.HARVESTING IN SUMMER.MR WILCOX LOVES HIS WORK AND WOULD NOT CHANGE IT.THEIR OLDEST SON IS TO BE A FARMER.THE FARMER OWNS 120 SHEEP,110 CATTLE 120 GALS A DAY,60 PIGS,2 FARM DOGS,40 CHICKENS 2020 EGGS ANNUALLY,5 WILD CATS,1 HORSE,1 PONY,12 ACRES BARLEY,2 ACRES SWEDES,1 ACRE POTATOES,2 TRACTORS,1 ELEVATOR,2 WAGO NS,BAILER,SPRAYER,SEED DRILL,ARTIFICIA L SPREADER,SAW BENCH,HAYRAKER,PLOUGH, CULTIVATOR,ROLLER.ALL TOGETHER 227 ACR ES OF LAND.TRADES AT GLOUCESTER MARKET.(IT USED TO BE A POUND FARM. WILDLIFE FOXES,SPARROW HAWKS,WAGTAILS, YELLOW HAMMERS,MAGPIES,CROWS,MICE,SWALLOWS.
